games.name: Breathing Bubble
games.description: Control a bubble's size with your breath rhythm to achieve calm breathing cycles.
games.mechanics: Click and hold to inhale (bubble grows), release to exhale (bubble shrinks). Complete 5 calm breath cycles.

games.name: Focus Flow
games.description: Guide particles to their targets while avoiding distractions.
games.mechanics: Click on moving targets to score points. Targets move faster as you progress.

games.name: Calm Waters
games.description: Create gentle waves and watch particles flow peacefully.
games.mechanics: Drag to create waves in the water. Watch particles flow and achieve calm state.

games.name: Pattern Match
games.description: Match patterns quickly to improve cognitive processing speed.
games.mechanics: Memorize the pattern, then recreate it as quickly as possible.

games.name: Heartbeat Harmony
games.description: Sync your breathing with a slowing heartbeat visualization.
games.mechanics: Breathe in sync with the visual heartbeat to slow it down.

games.name: Thought Clouds
games.description: Watch worries float away as clouds.
games.mechanics: Type your worry and watch it transform into a cloud that drifts away.

games.name: Color Harmony
games.description: Create soothing color combinations and patterns.
games.mechanics: Select colors and create harmonious patterns. No right or wrong, just create.

games.name: Sound Match
games.description: Match calming nature sounds to corresponding images.
games.mechanics: Listen to sound, select matching visual from options.

games.name: Progressive Relaxation
games.mechanics: Follow prompts to tense and release muscle groups systematically.

games.name: Gratitude Garden
games.description: Plant flowers by typing things you're grateful for.
games.mechanics: Type gratitude, watch garden grow with each entry.
